column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The food here is phenomenal and I loved it -- however
column2: we had a reservation for 7 and when we got there with 7 + an infant
column3: we were told we had to wait an additional 20 mins just because of adding a baby. Though the food left a great taste in my mouth
column4: that experience left a bad taste in my mouth because it didn't seem very pro-family. Typically
column5: adding a child is not a big deal as you simply pull up a high chair or the guests can hold the infant
column6: which we offered to do. However
column7: the hostile attitude of the hostess made us feel like the baby was a burden. 5 stars for food and 2 stars for service. Would love to know what the restaurant plans to do as a follow up.
